lead_paragraph: Cindy Lloyd, the mother of the American volleyball player Carli Lloyd, left her bag at a Rio cruise ship terminal and then learned that the authorities had blown it up.

headline.print_headline: Olympian’s Mother Leaves a Suitcase at Check-In, and It Is Destroyed
headline.main: Olympian’s Mother Leaves a Suitcase at Check-In, and It Is Destroyed

snippet: Cindy Lloyd, the mother of the American volleyball player Carli Lloyd, left her bag at a Rio cruise ship terminal and then learned that the authorities had blown it up....
abstract: Brazilian authorities destroy suitcase of Cindy Lloyd, mother of American volleyball player Carli Lloyd, one of several precautionary controlled explosions that have occurred during course of Olympics; apologize to Lloyd after she reveals that suspicious items in unattended bag were not bomb but shampoo bottle, cellphone and cellphone charger.
